itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by attorney, YouTube star, and Second Amendment activist Colion Noir about Texas’ new constitutional carry gun law, his falling out with the NRA, if he’d ever run for office, how insane Texas real estate prices have gotten, and his favorite gun that he owns.
